constitutionalsection.catchline: Income tax; may be based upon the laws of the United States.
constitutionalsection.para: When an income tax is adopted by the Legislature, the Legislature may adopt an income tax law based upon the laws of the United States.

annotation.para: The Legislature has authority to enact state income tax laws which incorporate future income tax laws of the United States. Anderson v. Tiemann, 182 Neb. 393, 155 N.W.2d 322 (1967).
